Paragraph: ( Text ) The situation remains explosive in Namialo assembly area , in Nampula Province , where the government soldiers with the former Northern Improvement Brigade ( Brigada de Melhoramentos do Norte ) , BMN , and others in the Nampula Provincial Command continue to wait for the outcome of their demands .

| Organization | Location | Whether the Organization is based in the Location |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Northern Improvement Brigade (Brigada de Melhoramentos do Norte), BMN | Nampula Province | Yes, based on the context that BMN members are in the Nampula Provincial Command. |

Note that the other organizations mentioned in the text, such as the government soldiers and the Nampula Provincial Command, are not explicitly stated to be headquartered or primarily operating in Nampula Province. However, the fact that BMN members are in the Nampula Provincial Command suggests that BMN has a significant presence in the province.
